statements: UPDATE sustainable_farming_practices_info SET description = 'Using organic fertilizers and avoiding chemical pesticides.' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sustainable_farming_practices_info SET impact_on_environment = 'Reduced soil erosion and biodiversity conservation.' WHERE practice_name = 'Crop Rotation';
UPDATE sustainable_farming_practices_info SET description='Involves crop rotation and natural fertilizers', impact_on_environment='Reduces soil degradation' WHERE practice_name='Crop Rotation'

UPDATE sustainable_farming_practices_info SET benefits_to_farmers='Increases soil fertility and crop yield', description='Use of cover crops and minimal tillage practices' WHERE impact_on_environment='Benefits water quality'
UPDATE sustainable_farming_practices SET description = 'Reduced water usage' WHERE practice_name = 'Drip Irrigation'
UPDATE farmers_information SET location = 'California', contact_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE farmer_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE sustainable_farming_practices SET description = 'Improved soil health and fertility' WHERE id = 'f67d9e59-91b6-488c-8189-9e8b7d80229c';
UPDATE farmers_information SET contact_number = '123-456-7890', location = 'Farmhouse Road' WHERE farmer_id = '7a972f7c-ccd2-49b2-9b50-87494e56b739';
UPDATE SustainableFarmingPractices SET benefits = 'Improved soil health' WHERE practice_id = 1;
UPDATE SustainableFarmingPractices SET description = 'Uses natural fertilizers' WHERE practice_id = 2;
UPDATE SustainableFarmingPractices SET description = 'Conserves water and reduces pollution' WHERE practice_id = 1
UPDATE SustainableFarmingPractices SET benefits = 'Improves soil health and biodiversity' WHERE practice_name = 'Crop Rotation'
UPDATE Farmers SET farm_location = 'New Farm Location', sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE farmer_id = 1;
UPDATE Crops SET crop_type = 'Organic' WHERE crop_id = 3;
UPDATE Farmers SET farm_location = 'New Location', sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE farmer_id = 1;
UPDATE Crops SET crop_type = 'Organic' WHERE crop_name = 'Avocado';
UPDATE practices SET name = 'New Name', description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE farmers SET location = 'New Location', name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE practices SET name='Agroforestry', description='A sustainable agricultural practice that integrates trees and shrubs into crop and livestock production systems' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE farm_practices SET practice_id=2, farm_id=3 WHERE id=1;
